name: "Nice" Cream

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix or Strawberry Margarita Mix
mixed frozen berries such as strawberries, cherries, raspberries, or blueberries

preparation:
1. Cut peeled bananas into small pieces. Place in a food processor; add dip mix, protein blend, and vanilla, if desired.
  2. Pulse until creamy, scraping down the sides as necessary. Turn into a bowl and stir in berries; freeze until ready to use. Serve with toppings, if desired.
